import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Router, ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { HttpClient} from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list-user', templateUrl: './list-user.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list-user.component.css'] }) export class ListUserComponent { userInfo:any = [] allUserInfo :any= []; constructor( private route: ActivatedRoute ){ } ngOnInit(){ this.userInfo = this.route.snapshot.data; console.log(this.userInfo.listUser.data ,"userInfoooooooooooooooo"); this.allUserInfo = this.userInfo.listUser.data; } }
